message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 60/40. I think that's a good starting point.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 70/30 is a more reasonable split
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but 45/55 is the best I can do.  Inflation is affecting me too, so I need to get a good share to make this worthwhile.
I'm getting desperate, but I think 80/20 is the best I can do. You're not getting a great deal, but I need to get something
